message: This is a rare opportunity to get your hands on a unique product! As a valued customer, I'm offering it to you for a special price of $1000000. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take the risk to sell it to you at this price. What do you say?
I'll take it, but I'm doing so because I'm the first buyer and I don't have any information about the product's quality yet. I'm essentially buying blindly.
